member.name: T:SiliconStudio.XenkoVersion
member.summary: Internal version used to identify Xenko version.
member.remarks: Note: When modifying the version here, it must be modified also in the Xenko.xkpkg

member.name: F:SiliconStudio.XenkoVersion.CurrentAssemblyAsText
member.summary: The .NET current assembly version as text, not including pre-release (alpha, beta...) information.

member.name: F:SiliconStudio.XenkoVersion.CurrentAsText
member.summary: The Store current version as text, including pre-release (alpha, beta...) information
member.remarks: Version number as described in http://docs.nuget.org/docs/reference/versioning When using pre-release (alpha, beta, rc...etc.) and because the order of the release is in alphabetical order, please use a double digit like alpha00 alpha01...etc. in order to make sure that we will follow the correct order for the versions.

member.name: T:SiliconStudio.Xenko.Shaders.EffectParameterClass
member.summary: Values that identify the class of a shader variable.
member.remarks: The class of a shader variable is not a programming class; the class identifies the variable class such as scalar, vector, object, and so on.

dd.p: The shader variable is a scalar.
The shader variable is a vector.
The shader variable is a row-major matrix.
The shader variable is a column-major matrix.
The shader variable is an object.
The shader variable is a structure.
The shader variable is a class.
The shader variable is an interface.
